industry: Retail Health and Personal Care Products
description:
Our Client, a confidential beauty brand is seeking for an Inventory Planner to join their team!
This role will be 20 hours a week.

Must have experience with major beauty clients (Sephora, Ulta, etc).

You will be responsible for:

* Excel projections
* Progressions
* Planning

If this sounds like you, please email an updated resume to ale@fourthfloor.com

We will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring. California applicants, please view our Privacy Notice here:<u> https://careergroupcompanies.com/california-privacy-notice/</u>.



**You can use WorkGrades to collect and manage your references for free and share them with us or anyone else you choose by visiting workgrades.com/home/candidate. Candidates with references are always preferred by our clients. Now is the most important time to stand out from the crowd. We suggest that you ensure you have updated your LinkedIn profile and that you start collecting your references early.**
